name: PartialArthroplastyOfHip
title: Partial Arthroplasty of Hip
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for partial arthroplasty of the hip.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for partial arthroplasty of the hip.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
